title: What fruits keep well in warm temperatures? - Quora

response.answer_text: Garlic and onions should be kept at room temperature (or cooler) in a well-ventilated area. Tomatoes should be stored at room temperature and washed just before using. Mangoes, plums, peaches, and pears can be ripened at room temperature in a brown paper bag and should then be refrigerated for longer storage.
